name: Elemental Showdown
description:
Short game made for my school's Halloween Game Jam. The main character is an elf named Faris who is out to stop the angered Spirits of the Forest, which represent the five elements.

Controls:

  1. Z-Shoot
  2. Space-Jump
  3. X-Stay in place (to aim without moving)

Edit note: I had to reupload a few times due to some unintended bugs.
